Title: Works-in-Progress
Description: Dances performed were "When Will I Be Loved"; "Paste del Giorno"; "Getting About My Business"; (Untitled: About Friends); "I Used to Be A Dancer And Now I Am"; "A Subtle Distinction"; "Seven Dreams and an Awakening"; "Elevator Operators & Other Strangers"; "The Master in Margarita"; [4 "Untitled" works].
Subject: Dance--United States

Title: The Dance Exchange Spring Concert Series
Description: Performed at Epiphany Church in Washington, D.C. Dances performed were "Ms. Galaxy and Her Three Raps with God"; "Woman of the Clear Vision"; "Difficulty in the Beginning"; and "First Solos: an Anthology."
